docblock.description: Classifies a document against an index

Provides an interface for classifier.
docblock.long-description: Implementing classes are classifiers capable of classifying documents into categories

docblock.description: Returns whether or not the document is of the category

tag.name: return
tag.description: Whether or not the document is in the category

docblock.description: Classify the document and return its category
Builds the index from the data source by applying transforms to the data source
Add a transform to be applied to the source data to achieve classification
Set an array of transform to be applied to the source data to achieve classification
This file is part of the Statistical Classifier package.
A generic classifier which can be used to built a classifier given a number of injected components
Tokenizer (the way of breaking up documents)
Take tokenized data and make it consistent or stem it
The rule to use to classify a document
The index to apply the transforms to
An array of Transforms implementing TransformInterface
Create the classifying using the numerous components passed in

tag.name: param
tag.description: The tokenizer to break up the documents

docblock.description: This file is part of the Statistical Classifier package.
